selectDistinctUnion: SELECT DISTINCT SOURCE.ENTY_KEY "SrcEntyKey" , SOURCE.ENTY_ID "SrcId" , 'AMS Asset' "SrcFamilyCapt" , CASE ISNULL(EXT.ENTY_KEY, 0) WHEN 0 THEN 'I' ELSE 'X' END "Included" FROM (SELECT MI_APTAG.ENTY_KEY, MI_ENTITIES.ENTY_ID, MI_APTAG.MI_SITE_KEY FROM MI_APTAG JOIN MI_ENTITIES ON MI_ENTITIES.ENTY_KEY = MI_APTAG.ENTY_KEY AND MI_ENTITIES.FMLY_KEY = MI_APTAG.FMLY_KEY) SOURCE  JOIN MIV_MIR_HASTAG REL ON REL.SUCC_ENTY_KEY = SOURCE.ENTY_KEY  JOIN MIV_MI_AST_HRCY_MV ASSETHRCY ON ASSETHRCY.ENTY_KEY = REL.PRED_ENTY_KEY  JOIN MI_ENTITIES ASSET ON ASSET.ENTY_KEY = ASSETHRCY.ENTY_KEY  LEFT JOIN MI_HLTH_IND_EXCLUSIONS EXT ON EXT.ENTY_KEY = SOURCE.ENTY_KEY WHERE ASSETHRCY.the_level = 0 UNION SELECT DISTINCT SOURCE.ENTY_KEY "SrcEntyKey" , SOURCE.ENTY_ID "SrcId" , 'GE Tag' "SrcFamilyCapt" , CASE ISNULL(EXT.ENTY_KEY, 0) WHEN 0 THEN 'I' ELSE 'X' END "Included" FROM (SELECT MI_GETAG.ENTY_KEY, MI_ENTITIES.ENTY_ID, MI_GETAG.MI_SITE_KEY FROM MI_GETAG JOIN MI_ENTITIES ON MI_ENTITIES.ENTY_KEY = MI_GETAG.ENTY_KEY AND MI_ENTITIES.FMLY_KEY = MI_GETAG.FMLY_KEY) SOURCE  JOIN MIV_MIR_HASTAG REL ON REL.SUCC_ENTY_KEY = SOURCE.ENTY_KEY  JOIN MIV_MI_AST_HRCY_MV ASSETHRCY ON ASSETHRCY.ENTY_KEY = REL.PRED_ENTY_KEY  JOIN MI_ENTITIES ASSET ON ASSET.ENTY_KEY = ASSETHRCY.ENTY_KEY  LEFT JOIN MI_HLTH_IND_EXCLUSIONS EXT ON EXT.ENTY_KEY = SOURCE.ENTY_KEY WHERE ASSETHRCY.the_level = 0 UNION SELECT DISTINCT SOURCE.ENTY_KEY "SrcEntyKey" , SOURCE.ENTY_ID "SrcId" , 'Measurement Location' "SrcFamilyCapt" , CASE SOURCE.MI_CHECK_PT_HI_SOURCE_L WHEN 'Y' THEN 'I' ELSE 'X' END "Included" FROM (SELECT MI_MEAS_LOC.ENTY_KEY, MI_CHECK_PT.MI_CHECK_PT_HI_SOURCE_L, MI_ENTITIES.ENTY_ID, MI_MEAS_LOC.MI_SITE_KEY FROM MI_MEAS_LOC JOIN MI_CHECK_PT ON MI_CHECK_PT.ENTY_KEY = MI_MEAS_LOC.ENTY_KEY JOIN MI_ENTITIES ON MI_ENTITIES.ENTY_KEY = MI_MEAS_LOC.ENTY_KEY AND MI_ENTITIES.FMLY_KEY = MI_MEAS_LOC.FMLY_KEY) SOURCE  JOIN MIV_MIR_HS_MEASLOC REL ON REL.SUCC_ENTY_KEY = SOURCE.ENTY_KEY  JOIN MIV_MI_AST_HRCY_MV ASSETHRCY ON ASSETHRCY.ENTY_KEY = REL.PRED_ENTY_KEY  JOIN MI_ENTITIES ASSET ON ASSET.ENTY_KEY = ASSETHRCY.ENTY_KEY WHERE ASSETHRCY.the_level = 0 UNION SELECT DISTINCT SOURCE.ENTY_KEY "SrcEntyKey" , SOURCE.ENTY_ID "SrcId" , 'OPC Tag' "SrcFamilyCapt" , CASE ISNULL(EXT.ENTY_KEY, 0) WHEN 0 THEN 'I' ELSE 'X' END "Included" FROM (SELECT MI_XITAG.ENTY_KEY, MI_ENTITIES.ENTY_ID, MI_XITAG.MI_SITE_KEY FROM MI_XITAG JOIN MI_ENTITIES ON MI_ENTITIES.ENTY_KEY = MI_XITAG.ENTY_KEY AND MI_ENTITIES.FMLY_KEY = MI_XITAG.FMLY_KEY) SOURCE  JOIN MIV_MIR_HASXITAG REL ON REL.SUCC_ENTY_KEY = SOURCE.ENTY_KEY  JOIN MIV_MI_AST_HRCY_MV ASSETHRCY ON ASSETHRCY.ENTY_KEY = REL.PRED_ENTY_KEY  JOIN MI_ENTITIES ASSET ON ASSET.ENTY_KEY = ASSETHRCY.ENTY_KEY  LEFT JOIN MI_HLTH_IND_EXCLUSIONS EXT ON EXT.ENTY_KEY = SOURCE.ENTY_KEY WHERE ASSETHRCY.the_level = 0
selectTotalTypeWhere: SELECT [MI_EQUIP000].[MI_EQUIP000_EQUIP_TECH_NBR_C] "Equipment Technical Number" , [MI_EQUIP000].[SC_EQUIP000_TAX_TYPE_DESC_C] "Taxonomy Type Description" , Count([MI_EVWKHIST].[MI_EVENT_ID]) "count alias" , [MI_EVWKHIST].[MI_EVWKHIST_MAINT_START_D] "Maintenance Start Date" , [MI_EVWKHIST].[MI_EVWKHIST_FAILR_MODE_DESC_C] "Failure Mode Description" , Sum([MI_EVWKHIST].[MI_EVWKHIST_MAINT_CST_N]) "Maintenance Cost" , Sum([MI_EVWKHIST].[MI_EVWKHIST_MECH_DWN_TIME_N]) "Mechanical Down Time" FROM [MI_EQUIP000] JOIN_SUCC [MI_EVWKHIST] ON {MIR_HSWKHST} WHERE [MI_EVWKHIST].[MI_EVWKHIST_MAINT_START_D] > (# :dt :utc '2009-01-01 05:00:00') GROUP BY [MI_EQUIP000].[MI_EQUIP000_EQUIP_TECH_NBR_C], [MI_EQUIP000].[SC_EQUIP000_TAX_TYPE_DESC_C], [MI_EVWKHIST].[MI_EVWKHIST_MAINT_START_D], [MI_EVWKHIST].[MI_EVWKHIST_FAILR_MODE_DESC_C] ORDER BY Sum([MI_EVWKHIST].[MI_EVWKHIST_MAINT_CST_N]) Desc
selectWithLikeCriteria:
SELECT [MI_ACTION].[MI_ACTION_ID_C] "Action ID"
, [MI_ACTION].[MI_ACTION_RESOURCE_COST_N] "Cost", [MI_ACTION].[MI_ACTION_SHORT_DESC_C] "Name", [MI_ACTION].[MI_ACTION_TARGE_COMPL_DATE_CHR] "Target Completion Date", [MI_ACTION].[MI_ACTION_SHUTDOWN_L] "Shutdown Required"FROM [MI_ACTION]
WHERE [MI_ACTION].[MI_ACTION_SHORT_DESC_C] LIKE '%a%'
